welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Aberdeen, the charming coastal city known for its vibrant culture and stunning landscapes. We invite you to immerse yourself in all this city has to offer and create unforgettable memories during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Municipal Airport serves smaller airlines and offers a more relaxed atmosphere for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
